attributes.title: HORRENDOUS APP!!!
attributes.review: This application when opened caused my eyes to not only water but then profusely squirt out blood. The gag worthy sight of the man in a suit claiming to be our president has now caused me emotional distress and loss of sight in one eye. The word Trump 2020 is now a trigger word that makes me break into cold sweats and see stars that can lead to a dizzy spell and have given me heart palpitations. The content on this app is incorrect and completely bias.
